name: Emetinum
details:
Principal alkaloid of Ipecac. A powerful amebicide, but is not a bactericide. 
Specific for amebiasis; of remarkable value in treatment of amebic dysentery; 

In physiological doses must be carefully watched. 
May produce hepatization of lungs, rapid heart action, tendency for the head to fall forward and lobar pneumonia.
dosage: pyorrhoea: 1/2 gr Daily for three days, then less. Psoriasis: 1/2 gr Hypodermically. Diarrhea: Emetin hydroch 2X.

Abdomen: Diarrhea with colicky, abdominal pains and nausea.
Mouth: Inflammation of the gums and tooth sockets with pus.
